name: Bitmap Brothers Video File
summary: A JV file is a multimedia file used by Z (for MS- DOS ) and Z 95 (for Windows 95), a real-time strategy video game developed by Bitmap Brothers. It contains audio and video data and metadata , such as copyright information and the video compression method. JV files are used to save scenes played at various points of gameplay, including when the game first loads and between levels.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
